metadata.description:
"Drink Ain't Free" is the latest single from my sophomore album "The King's Alpha," which drops on April 28. The song features Allan Kingdom and Alec King, and was produced by KAJÉ. The song was also mixed by Timbaland in TimboLand.

This song NFT is a free drop (max one free claim per wallet) for any wallets that were holding a NFT from any of the following collections at 12:00am on March 31 (eligible wallets determined by snapshot):

1) "I'm Spottie" by Spottie WiFi
2) "Little Prince: Vol. 1" by Allan Kingdom
3) Any and all Sound.xyz drops from Allan Kingdom, Alec King and/or Spottie WiFi

There are five song NFTs from the "The King's Alpha" album that you must collect in order to claim a free physical vinyl record of the album. "Drink Ain't Free" is one of those five, and the other four are:

1) "All Time High" (available now on secondary market)
2) "Full Set" (available now on secondary market)
3) "Believers" feat. Bart Oatmeal (coming soon)
4) "Buy the Dips" feat. Jim Jones (coming soon)

lyrics.text:
HOOK (Allan Kingdom):

Shorty wanna spend all of my money
She know I got a lot cuz I be living super cheap
Shorty wanna floss but it’s so funny
She know I got that sauce she really should be paying me

The drip ain't free
The drink ain't free
She want that sauce she really should be paying me

The drip ain't free
The drink ain't free
She want that sauce she really should be paying me

VERSE 1 (Alec King)
Only show up if it’s free
Cuz I spend all of my money on these hoes and NFTs
My wifi looking spotty but got Spottie on the beat
I’m waiting in the lobby about to sneak into Petit

Like I need a drink, I need a spliff, walk around seeing double
I need a dip, she wanna stick, she wanna sleep and cuddle
She know I’m not famous but she treat me like I was
Feel like my bar mitzvah every time I’m in the club like
 
HOOK (Allan Kingdom):

Shorty wanna spend all of my money
She know I got a lot cuz I be living super cheap
Shorty wanna floss but it’s so funny
She know I got that sauce she really should be paying me

The drip ain't free
The drink ain't free
She want that sauce she really should be paying me

The drip ain't free
The drink ain't free
She want that sauce she really should be paying me

VERSE 2 (Spottie WiFi):

In back of the club with a table n bottles
I heard the whole market was dipping but not us
It’s Spottie and AK we going full throttle 
But girl if you asking for drinks I got nada

I ain’t flexing but the light make the chain bling
It's a bandemic girl, we just tryna maintain
Yeah you know we run it Cheetah Gang Gang
And if haters want beef we want the same thing

My credit is mid girl I ain't really liquid
I don’t pay for shit but some jpegs to flip quick
They gravitate to me my energy big dick
And yes you can sit but you can’t have a sip sip

She want the WiFi, girl it ain’t public
She say I’m balling, I’m changing the subject
I’m Spottie and I’m doxxed, I can’t hide shit
Stingy with it so u know I can’t buy shit

HOOK (Allan Kingdom):

Shorty wanna spend all of my money
She know I got a lot cuz I be living super cheap
Shorty wanna floss but it’s so funny
She know I got that sauce she really should be paying me

The drip ain't free
The drink ain't free
She want that sauce she really should be paying me

The drip ain't free
The drink ain't free
She want that sauce she really should be paying me
